member.name: T:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest
member.summary:
Discover movies by different types of data like average rating, number of votes, genres and certifications. You can get a valid list of certifications from the certifications list method (https://developers.themoviedb.org/3/certifications/get-movie-certifications).
Discover also supports a nice list of sort options.See below for all of the available options.
Please note, when using certification \ certification.lte you must also specify certification_country.These two parameters work together in order to filter the results.You can only filter results with the countries we have added to our.
If you specify the region parameter, the regional release date will be used instead of the primary release date. The date returned will be the first date based on your query (ie. if a with_release_type is specified). It's important to note the order of the release types that are used. Specifying "2|3" would return the limited theatrical release date as opposed to "3|2" which would return the theatrical date.
Also note that a number of filters support being comma(,) or pipe(|) separated.Comma's are treated like an AND and query while pipe's are an OR.
Some examples of what can be done with discover can be found https://www.themoviedb.org/documentation/api/discover.

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.LanguageAbbreviation
member.summary: Specify a language to query translatable fields with. minLength: 2 pattern: ([a - z]{2})-([A - Z]{2}) default: en - US

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.RegionCountryCode
member.summary: Specify a ISO 3166-1 code to filter release dates. Must be uppercase. pattern: ^[A-Z]{2}$

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.SortBy
member.summary:
Choose from one of the many available sort options.
Allowed Values: popularity.asc , popularity.desc, release_date.asc , release_date.desc, revenue.asc , revenue.desc, primary_release_date.asc , primary_release_date.desc, original_title.asc , original_title.desc, vote_average.asc , vote_average.desc, vote_count.asc , vote_count.desc default: popularity.desc

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.CertificationCountry
member.summary: Used in conjunction with the certification filter, use this to specify a country with a valid certification.

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.Certification
member.summary: Filter results with a valid certification from the 'certification_country' field.

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.CertificationLessThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: Filter and only include movies that have a certification that is less than or equal to the specified value.

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.CertificationGreaterThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: Filter and only include movies that have a certification that is greater than or equal to the specified value.

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.IncludeAdult
member.summary: A filter and include or exclude adult movies.

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.IncludeVideo
member.summary: A filter to include or exclude videos.

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.Page
member.summary: Specify the page of results to query. minimum: 1 maximum: 1000 default: 1

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.PrimaryReleaseYear
member.summary: A filter to limit the results to a specific primary release year.

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.PrimaryReleaseDateGreaterThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: Filter and only include movies that have a primary release date that is greater or equal to the specified value. format: date

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.PrimaryReleaseDateLessThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: Filter and only include movies that have a primary release date that is less than or equal to the specified value. format: date

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.ReleaseDateGreaterThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: Filter and only include movies that have a release date (looking at all release dates) that is greater or equal to the specified value. format: date

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.ReleaseDateLessThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: Filter and only include movies that have a release date (looking at all release dates) that is less than or equal to the specified value. format: date

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.WithReleaseTypes
member.summary: These release types map to the same values found on the movie release date method. search type: AND (,) minimum: 1 maximum: 6

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.WithEitherReleaseTypes
member.summary: These release types map to the same values found on the movie release date method. search type: OR (|) minimum: 1 maximum: 6

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.Year
member.summary: A filter to limit the results to a specific year (looking at all release dates).

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.VoteCountGreaterThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: Filter and only include movies that have a vote count that is greater or equal to the specified value. minimum: 0

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.VoteCountLessThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: Filter and only include movies that have a vote count that is less than or equal to the specified value. minimum: 0

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.VoteAverageGreaterThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: Filter and only include movies that have a rating that is greater or equal to the specified value. minimum: 1

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.VoteAverageLessThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: Filter and only include movies that have a rating that is less than or equal to the specified value. minimum: 1

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.WithCastIds
member.summary: A comma separated list of person ID's. Only include movies that have one of the ID's added as an actor.

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.WithCrewIds
member.summary: A comma separated list of person ID's. Only include movies that have one of the ID's added as a crew member.

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.WithPeopleIds
member.summary: A comma separated list of person ID's. Only include movies that have one of the ID's added as a either a actor or a crew member.

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.WithCompanyIds
member.summary: A comma separated list of production company ID's. Only include movies that have one of the ID's added as a production company.

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.WithGenreIds
member.summary: Comma separated value of genre ids that you want to include in the results. search type: AND (,)

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.WithEitherGenreIds
member.summary: Pipe separated value of genre ids that you want to include in the results. search type: OR (|)

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.WithoutGenreIds
member.summary: Comma separated value of genre ids that you want to exclude from the results. search type: AND (,)

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.WithoutEitherGenreIds
member.summary: Pipe separated value of genre ids that you want to exclude from the results. search type: OR (|)

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.WithKeywordIds
member.summary: A comma separated list of keyword ID's. Only includes movies that have one of the ID's added as a keyword. search type: AND (,)

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.WithEitherKeywordIds
member.summary: A comma separated list of keyword ID's. Only includes movies that have one of the ID's added as a keyword. search type: OR (|)

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.WithoutKeywordIds
member.summary: Exclude items with certain keywords. search type: AND (,)

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.WithoutEitherKeywordIds
member.summary: Exclude items with certain keywords. search type: OR (|)

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.WithRuntimeGreaterThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: Filter and only include movies that have a runtime that is greater or equal to a value.

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.WithRuntimeLessThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: Filter and only include movies that have a runtime that is less than or equal to a value.

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.WithOriginalLanguageAbbreviation
member.summary: Specify an ISO 639-1 string to filter results by their original language value.

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.WithWatchProviderIds
member.summary: A comma list of watch provider ID's. Combine this filter with watch_region in order to filter your results by a specific watch provider in a specific region. search type: AND (,)

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.WithEitherWatchProviderIds
member.summary: A pipe separated list of watch provider ID's. Combine this filter with watch_region in order to filter your results by a specific watch provider in a specific region. search type: OR (|)

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Discover.DiscoverMovieRequest.WithWatchProviderRegionCountryCode
member.summary: An ISO 3166-1 code. Combine this filter with with_watch_providers in order to filter your results by a specific watch provider in a specific region.

member.name: T:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.TV.DiscoverTVRequest
member.summary:
Discover TV shows by different types of data like average rating, number of votes, genres, the network they aired on and air dates.
Discover also supports a nice list of sort options. See below for all of the available options.
Also note that a number of filters support being comma(,) or pipe(|) separated.Comma's are treated like an AND and query while pipe's are an OR.
Some examples of what can be done with discover can be found https://www.themoviedb.org/documentation/api/discover.

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.TV.DiscoverTVRequest.LanguageAbbreviation
member.summary: Specify a language to query translatable fields with. minLength: 2 pattern: ([a - z]{2})-([A - Z]{2}) default: en - US

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.TV.DiscoverTVRequest.SortBy
member.summary: Choose from one of the many available sort options. Allowed Values: vote_average.desc , vote_average.asc, first_air_date.desc , first_air_date.asc, popularity.desc , popularity.asc default: popularity.desc

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.TV.DiscoverTVRequest.AirDateGreaterThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: Filter and only include TV shows that have a air date (by looking at all episodes) that is greater or equal to the specified value. format: date

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.TV.DiscoverTVRequest.AirDateLessThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: Filter and only include TV shows that have a air date (by looking at all episodes) that is less than or equal to the specified value. format: date

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.TV.DiscoverTVRequest.FirstAirDateGreaterThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: Filter and only include TV shows that have a original air date that is greater or equal to the specified value. Can be used in conjunction with the "include_null_first_air_dates" filter if you want to include items with no air date. format: date

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.TV.DiscoverTVRequest.FirstAirDateLessThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: Filter and only include TV shows that have a original air date that is less than or equal to the specified value. Can be used in conjunction with the "include_null_first_air_dates" filter if you want to include items with no air date. equal to the specified value. format: date

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.TV.DiscoverTVRequest.FirstAirDateYear
member.summary: Filter and only include TV shows that have a original air date year that equal to the specified value. Can be used in conjunction with the "include_null_first_air_dates" filter if you want to include items with no air date.

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.TV.DiscoverTVRequest.Page
member.summary: Specify the page of results to query. minimum: 1 maximum: 1000 default: 1

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.TV.DiscoverTVRequest.Timezone
member.summary: Used in conjunction with the air_date.gte/lte filter to calculate the proper UTC offset. default: America/New_York

If you want to include a fallback language (especially useful for backdrops) you can use the include_image_language parameter. member.name: T:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.TV.TVWatchProvidersRequest
member.summary: Powered by our partnership with JustWatch, you can query this method to get a list of the availabilities per country by provider. This is not going to return full deep links, but rather, it's just enough information to display what's available where. You can link to the provided TMDb URL to help support TMDb and let your users deep link into the content.

member.summary: Querying images with a language parameter will filter the results. If you want to include a fallback language (especially useful for backdrops) you can use the include_image_language parameter.This should be a comma seperated value like so: include_image_language= en,null.

member.name: T:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Movies.MovieWatchProvidersRequest
member.summary: Powered by our partnership with JustWatch, you can query this method to get a list of the availabilities per country by provider. This is not going to return full deep links, but rather, it's just enough information to display what's available where. You can link to the provided TMDb URL to help support TMDb and let your users deep link into the content.

member.name: T:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Movies.NowPlayingMoviesRequest
member.summary: Get a list of movies in theatres. This is a release type query that looks for all movies that have a release type of 2 or 3 within the specified date range. You can optionally specify a region prameter which will narrow the search to only look for theatrical release dates within the specified country.

member.name: P:TMDb.Client.Api.V3.Models.Movies.NowPlayingMoviesRequest.Page
member.summary: Specify which page to query. minimum: 1 maximum: 1000 default: 1
